BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to grant the authority for the submission of a Proposed Final Comprehensive Solid Waste Management Plan for the City of New York.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Grant the authority for the submission of a Proposed Final Comprehensive Solid Waste Management Plan for NYC.

Items.Title: Resolution finding that submission by the department of sanitation of a proposed final comprehensive solid waste management plan dated July 19, 2006 to the New York state department of environmental conservation conforms to the New York state environmental quality review act.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Finding that submission by the Dept of sanitation of a proposed final comprehensive solid waste management plan dated July 19, 2006 to the NYS Dept of environmental conservation conforms to the NYS environmental quality review act.

Items.Title: A Local Law to grant the authority for the submission of a Proposed Final Comprehensive Solid Waste Management Plan for the City of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Grant the authority for the submission of a Proposed Final Comprehensive Solid Waste Management Plan for NYC.

Items.Title: Resolution finding that submission by the department of sanitation of a proposed final comprehensive solid waste management plan dated July 19, 2006 to the New York state department of environmental conservation conforms to the New York state environmental quality review act.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Finding that submission by the Dept of sanitation of a proposed final comprehensive solid waste management plan dated July 19, 2006 to the NYS Dept of environmental conservation conforms to the NYS environmental quality review act.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Brewer, Barron, Felder, Reyna, Gerson, Weprin, Oddo, Katz, Recchia, Dilan and Vallone.

Items.Title: A Local Law to grant the authority for the submission of a Proposed Final Comprehensive Solid Waste Management Plan for the City of New York.
